response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to streamline processes, enhance productivity, and ultimately contribute to the growth of your company. Given its unique features and the value it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
